description:
Nuku Nuku`s class decides to film a movie. After a chance remark by Ryunosuke, she becomes depressed that as an Androbot, she can`t share the passion of their youth and the sweat of their efforts. But she channels this into making her starring performance even better.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nuku Nuku Blue Spring of Youth Diaries - All Purpose Cultural Musical
Nuku Nuku Seishun Nikki! Bannou Bunka Musical!
ヌクヌク青春日記! 万能文化ミュージカル!
